description: A simple Hello World workflow to demonstrate the FlowPilot system and workflow discovery capabilities
business_value: Demonstrates FlowPilot capabilities and provides a starting point for new users to understand workflow creation

focus_areas: Show how easy it is to add new workflows

result_synthesizer.description: Generate welcome messages and educational summaries

splunk_mcp.description: Gather basic system information for demonstration

demo_introduction.name: Demo Introduction
demo_introduction.description: Welcome user and introduce FlowPilot capabilities

tasks.title: Welcome Message
tasks.goal: Introduce user to FlowPilot system and this demo workflow

tasks.title: Basic System Info
tasks.description: Gather simple system information for demonstration
tasks.goal: Show how FlowPilot can interact with Splunk systems

educational_summary.name: Educational Summary
educational_summary.description: Provide educational summary about FlowPilot system

tasks.title: Educational Summary
tasks.description: Create educational summary explaining workflow system
tasks.goal: Educate user about FlowPilot capabilities and workflow creation

tasks.name: welcome_message
tasks.description: Display a welcome message to introduce the user to FlowPilot
tasks.prompt: Create a friendly welcome message explaining that this is a Hello World demonstration of the FlowPilot workflow system. Mention that this workflow was automatically discovered and is running through the FlowPilot agent.

tasks.name: system_info
tasks.description: Gather basic system information to demonstrate data collection
tasks.prompt: Get basic Splunk system information like server info and available indexes. Keep it simple for demonstration purposes.

tasks.name: summary_report
tasks.description: Create a summary report of the Hello World workflow execution
tasks.prompt: Create a summary report of this Hello World workflow execution. Include: 1) Welcome message confirmation, 2) Basic system info gathered, 3) Explanation that this demonstrates how new workflows can be added to FlowPilot by simply dropping JSON files in the contrib/flows directory. Make it educational and encouraging.

expected_outcome: User understands how FlowPilot works and how easy it is to add new workflows

common_issues.solution: Ensure JSON file is valid and in correct directory structure
